subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Dallas goalie Marty Turco made 49 saves and stopped Alex Ovechkin in the opening round of a shootout as the Stars defeated the Washington Capitals, 4-3.
snippet: Dallas goalie Marty Turco made 49 saves and stopped Alex Ovechkin in the opening round of a shootout as the Stars defeated the Washington Capitals, 4-3.
